channel.title: [562] How do i make a client for my server [562]
channel.description: Can anyone help me?, i want to make a client for my 562 server and can anyone help me on how to change the welcome message? Thanks if you can answer either question :)

item.title: [562] How do i make a client for my server [562]
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

darkanton:

Can anyone help me?, i want to make a client for my 562 server and can anyone help me on how to change the welcome message? Thanks if you can answer either question

the welcome message like “Welcome to RuneHeat 562”
like when you log in

go to your server files>data>scripts>authentication and its in there.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] How do i make a client for my server [562]
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“attk mast3r, post:2, topic:349827”]search for a keyword from the welcome message in client.java and it should lead you to it, make sure it is the right one by comparing the 2.

and as for the client i cant help but I’m sure you can find a person good with clients some where, i would help but i am better with servers.[/quote]

lold 562 isnt like gay 317 servers and for the answer i dont work wit 562 so cant help ya

Read full topic
